Articles.Content: I burn your body at the stake. Mine, [@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/)'s and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/)'s pile of ashes.

You take your ashes to your house. I manifest myself as a ghost and haunt you forever.

My haunted house.

I  hire demolition workers to take down said house. Then I claim the hill.

My hill.

> 
> 
> 21 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:
> 
> 
> I  hire demolition workers to take down said house. Then I claim the hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill.
> 

There is no hill left

#troll

Me, [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/)'s pile of what used to be a house

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-04T13:27:03Z" title="11/04/2016 01:27  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 4, 2016</time> by Wildcat111**

I cry in the corner wishing I had a hill.

My puddle of tears!

I take the form of a janitor and mop up that puddle and give you a hill.

My clean floors.

I build another hill and host a block party on it.

My gregarious hill.
I use Trump to Build wall to isolate you in your hill and to build another Biggerrrr and Betterrrrr and Strongerrrr hill

I get a two kilometre cube of antimatter and drop it into the centre of the planet.

MY asteroid field.
RED MATTER BOMB! My black hole.

Meh.

I collect some matter from around the black hole and build another hill.

I steal the matter from under you, and relocate the hill 5 miles away.

My hill

By the power of unexpected attack after a 9 moth hiatus off of the forums, I punch the hill right into the surface of a nearby Earth-like exoplanet and blast off at many times light speed to get to the top.

My hill.

I claim a hill on a planet in the farthest corner of the Universe where absolutely nobody can find me and prosecute me and my sandwich army for our crimes against humanity.

My lonely hill.

Ah.

I have a warpdrive.

I've historically been an ally of [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/), however, so I just bring a ship full of lawyers to start writing a good defence for the accused crimes.

I follow the ship full of lawyers and drop a courthouse on the hill. I then begin the trial. 

My boring legal proceedings.
I summon [@Dman979](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/123837-dman979/)! Notable for his work in the Eve Order Zero case.

I subpoena your hill.

My hill.

I plant an atomic bomb slightly underneath the ground and grab a baseball bat, proceed to play a round with you, and then proceed to lightly tap the bomb with my finger, and the bomb explodes.

My irradiated, fallout filled crater!

Little did anyone know, before [@Dman979](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/123837-dman979/) came to play, I switched out myself with a dummy sandwich and went to an unknown location only known to me.

My unknown location.

I subpoena you for information.

Our unknown location.

Subpoena... that's a writ forcing a person to appear before court, right? So you're having a trial at an undisclosed location...

I serve crackers and lemonade to all involved.

My bored jury members and revenue.

While everyone is eating the crackers and lemonade, I sneak out of the galactic court room and jump into a black hole to travel into a different universe. Anyone who tries to jump into the black hole after me will probably appear in another universe.

My universe.
I use D0n41d Mk3 the new president of America to capture the hill
i use my big expensive rocket to destroy all the hill, and most of the space program's buget
